item.title: DOM-based vulnerabilities
item.author: Hato0
item.description: DOM-based vulnerabilities DOM-based vulnerabilities are based on javascript values controlled by attackers called source and use it in dangerous functions called sink (values can be cookies or whatever and functions can be eval like ones so by modifying the cookie you’ve got RCE). Sources are very often : document.URL document.documentURI document.URLUnencoded document.baseURI location document.cookie document.referrer window.name history.pushState history.replaceState localStorage sessionStorage IndexedDB (mozIndexedDB, webkitIndexedDB, msIndexedDB) Database Sink related to vulnerabilites are (thanks to portswigger):
